description: Square array read by antidiagonals of number of ways of dividing nk labeled items into n labeled boxes with k items in each box.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,210
prog: (PARI) { i=0; for (m=1, 20, for (n=1, m, k=m - n + 1; write("b060538.txt", i++, " ", (n*k)!/k!^n)); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 06 2009]
crossrefs: Rows include A000012, A000984, A006480, A008977, A008978 etc. Columns include A000142, A000680, A014606, A014608, A014609 etc. Main diagonal is A034841.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 02 2001
